summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ali Moda 13x4" Ear to Ear Front Closures Extensions Brazilian Virgin Lace Frontal Closure and Human Hair Water Wave Bleached Knots With Baby Hair Natural Color 18 inches
Review Date: 2019/03/16
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
Review Text: Literally lasted a week and lost its curl pattern and became matted. They really need to up the quality of frontal hair. Bundles have good hair quality but we get extorted with these frontals.
Review Title: Frontal with low quality hair mats after a week
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DMS Body Wave 2 Bundles With 4x4 Free Part Closure Brazilian Virgin Hair 100% Unprocessed Human Hair Bundles Lace Closure Natural Black(18” 20”+16” Closure, Natural)
Review Date: 2020/09/04
Store: DMS
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'DMS'}
Review Text: I really like this hair, the bundles are kind of thin so make sure you’ve got some extra hair around if you want your weave thick thick.  I didn’t want to post a pic without the closure because I never understand folks who do that. I may post an update with a pic but it was a good buy.
Review Title: Good and Practical
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Brazilian Virgin Hair Lace Frontal with Bundles Loose Wave Human Hair Bundles With Lace Frontal Closure 13x4 Ear To Ear Frontal Remy Human Hair Extensions 20"22"24"+18"
Review Date: 2020/09/10
Store: Perstar
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Perstar', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.46 x 6.38 x 3.03 inches; 1.11 Pounds'}
Review Text: I bought this hair because I loved the curl pattern and saw all the reviews. As soon as I washed and conditioned it...as you can see from the pics nan one curl left.  The wefts are thick, the hair is good quality - although I haven’t worn it may post an update after - the frontal acted a little crazy after I bleached the knots but I used a great conditioner and it came right back. But no curls 😟😟
Review Title: No curls - misleading item pictures
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 9A Water Wave 1 Bundle 100g (20'') 100% Virgin Brazilian Wet and Wavy Human Hair Weave one Bundle 20 inch Natural Black
Review Date: 2021/03/12
Store: LANQI
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LANQI', 'Color': 'natural', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Product Dimensions': '15 x 12 x 0.7 inches; 4.9 Ounces', 'UPC': '682228541246'}
Review Text: The curl pattern is really weird, looks like they dipped it in hot water to make it longer? The top is thick and the bottom is stringy-looking.  The hair feels soft though. I’ll post an update.
Review Title: Distinct pattern
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a consistent preference for human hair products, particularly those with wavy textures. The individual shows a notable sensitivity to quality and performance, with dissatisfaction expressed towards items that do not maintain curl patterns or quality after short-term use. Ratings average around 3.5 to 4.0, indicating moderate satisfaction but highlighting frustrations with specific aspects, such as durability and visual appeal post-wash. 

Common themes include a necessity for bundled products alongside closures, suggesting a practical use for weaving rather than just extension applications. The buyer demonstrates a desire for dense volume, hinting at possible price sensitivity, as thin bundles do not meet their aesthetic expectations. Despite initial excitement over product quality, negative outcomes typically overshadow positive experiences, indicating a critical eye for potential misrepresentation in advertising.

Overall, the core preferences suggest a buyer who values high-quality, voluminous human hair with lasting characteristics, coupled with a pragmatic approach to purchasing. However, past experiences indicate a need for improved consistency across different product lines in texture and durability.

target_interaction.title: Perfect price for quality
target_interaction.text: The price is honestly good.  We all know these products are called Human Hair and they’re clearly not literally human hair.  The hair did melt when I tried to curl it, but I’ve kept it in a whole month with the help of hair serums and braiding it at night.  The curls were really pretty and it looks like Yaki hair now, it tangles a bit, but it is fine by me.  It doesn’t frizz or anything, once you brush the knots out and use serum, you’re good.
target_interaction.title_meta: Human Hair Bundles Remi Hair Natural Body Wave Human Hair Bundles Black Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Remi Virgin Hair Bundles 16 18 20 Inch for Women
